definitions.definition: catch one's foot on something and stumble or fall.
synonyms: wipe out "he tripped on the loose stones"

definitions.definition: cause (someone) to do this.
examples: she shot out her foot to trip him up

definitions.definition: make a mistake.
examples: taxpayers often trip up by not declaring taxable income
synonyms: fluff "students often trip up by forgetting to add a bibliography"

definitions.definition: detect or expose someone in an error, blunder, or inconsistency.
examples: the man was determined to trip him up on his economics
synonyms: wrong-foot "the question was intended to trip him up"

definitions.definition: walk, run, or dance with quick light steps.
examples: they tripped up the terrace steps
synonyms: scamper "they tripped merrily along the path"

definitions.definition: (of words) flow lightly and easily.
examples: a name that trips off the tongue

definitions.definition: activate (a mechanism), especially by contact with a switch, catch, or other electrical device.
synonyms: trigger; turn on "Hoffman tripped the alarm"

definitions.definition: (of part of an electric circuit) disconnect automatically as a safety measure.
examples: the plugs will trip as soon as any change in current is detected

definitions.definition: release and raise (an anchor) from the seabed by means of a buoyed line attached to the anchor's crown.
turn (a yard or other object) from a horizontal to a vertical position for lowering.
experience hallucinations induced by taking a psychedelic drug, especially LSD.
examples: they prance around tripping out on their hallucinogens

definitions.definition: be behaving in an irrational or crazy way.
examples: gerund or present participle: trippin'; gerund or present participle: trippin

definitions.definition: go on a short journey.
examples: when tripping through the Yukon, take some time to explore our museums

definitions.definition: an act of going to a place and returning; a journey or excursion, especially for pleasure.
examples: Sally's gone on a school trip

definitions.definition: a stumble or fall due to catching one's foot on something.
examples: stumble, slip, misstep, false step; Morefall, tumble, spill "a trip down icy front steps can be a devastating accident"Morefall, tumble, spill a trip down icy front steps can be a devastating accident

definitions.definition: a mistake.
examples: an occasional trip in the performance

definitions.definition: a hallucinatory experience caused by taking a psychedelic drug, especially LSD.
an exciting or stimulating experience.
examples: it was a trip seeing him again

definitions.definition: a self-indulgent attitude or activity.
a device that activates or disconnects a mechanism, circuit, etc.
a light, lively movement of a person's feet.
examples: yonder comes Dalinda; I know her by her trip
